dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so here's a hot take, right? Is it even good that our cities are just, like, exploding with people, and rural areas are, uh, shrinking?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so here's a hot take, right? Is it even good that our cities are just, like, exploding with people, and rural areas are, uh, shrinking?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! Exactly! Like, I was just reading about Kazakhstan, right? They just hit, uh, 20.3 million!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! Exactly! Like, I was just reading about Kazakhstan, right? They just hit, uh, twenty point three million!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the bureau, as of March 1, 2025, 20,316,155 people lived in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Twenty million! On March 1st, right? Like, that's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Twenty million! On March first, right? Like, that's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Bureau of National Statistics has announced the population of Kazakhstan as of March 1, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And Almaty and Turkestan are just, like, packed, over two million each.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And Almaty and Turkestan are just, like, packed, over two million each.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The most densely populated regions of Kazakhstan are still Almaty and the Turkestan region: 2,300,876 and 2,154,130 people lived there, respectively.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh, and five other regions are over a million, too! Astana, Shymkent, Karaganda, uh...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh, and five other regions are over a million, too! Astana, Shymkent, Karaganda, uh...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The population has exceeded 1 million in five regions of the country: Almaty Region (1,566,257 people), Astana (1,544,142 people), Shymkent (1,261,709 people), Zhambyl (1,221,439 people), and Karaganda (1,133,524 people) regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Zhambyl! Yes, exactly! Like, Astana's at 1.5 million now, it's crazy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zhambyl! Yes, exactly! Like, Astana's at one point five million now, it's crazy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The population has exceeded 1 million in five regions of the country: ... Astana (1,544,142 people), ... Zhambyl (1,221,439 people)...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But that's my point, though. Like, this whole urban, rural split. It's, um, it's pretty stark, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But that's my point, though. Like, this whole urban, rural split. It's, um, it's pretty stark, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally stark! Like, almost thirteen million in cities, seven and a half million, uh, in villages.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally stark! Like, almost thirteen million in cities, seven and a half million, uh, in villages.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ratio of urban and rural population in Kazakhstan as of March 1 was distributed as follows: 12,813,769 people lived in cities and 7,502,386 people lived in villages.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the change, though! Like, rural residents, uh, they decreased by almost eight thousand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the change, though! Like, rural residents, uh, they decreased by almost eight thousand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Compared to the beginning of the year, the number of rural residents has decreased by almost 8 thousand people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! While the urban population, like, shot up by over forty thousand! In just, what, a month?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! While the urban population, like, shot up by over forty thousand! In just, what, a month?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Compared to the beginning of the year, the number of rural residents has decreased by almost 8 thousand people. At the same time, the urban population, on the contrary, has increased by more than 40 thousand people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Forty thousand! In a month! That's, um, that's massive migration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forty thousand! In a month! That's, um, that's massive migration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Compared to the beginning of the year... the urban population, on the contrary, has increased by more than 40 thousand people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Massive! Yes, exactly! It's just, like, everyone's moving to the big cities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Massive! Yes, exactly! It's just, like, everyone's moving to the big cities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, is that sustainable, though? You know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, is that sustainable, though? You know?
